frontmatter.description: Configuration options for creating and attaching STEP files when publishing a part or assembly to eDrawings.

title: swEdrawingsAttachmentOption_e
description: Configuration options for creating and attaching STEP files when publishing a part or assembly to eDrawings.

values.description: = Create and attach STEP files to the active configuration only
= Create and attach STEP files to all configurations
= Do not create and attach any STEP files
= Create and attach STEP files to specified configurations only
